title: 5 looks we love this week: Sarah Jessica Parker, Zendaya, Adriana Lima and more
text:
It's the final week of September and lots of our favorite celebrities closed out the month in amazing style.

Zendaya kicked off this week wearing a mesmerizing Poison Ivy-inspired look for the 2019 Emmys, while Sarah Jessica Parker absolutely wowed in a blooming pink dress at the 2019 New York City Ballet Fall Gala.

It was certainly a week to remember full of a number of fabulous fashion moments.

Zendaya

Matt Winkelmeyer/Getty Images

Zendaya had everyone on the internet swooning over her emerald green Vera Wang gown and ruby red hair.

Sarah Jessica Parker

Mike Coppola/Getty Images

The "Sex and the City" star channeled Carrie Bradshaw wearing mismatched strappy shoes from her SJP collection along with a vibrant pink Zac Posen dress.

Adriana Lima

Daniele Venturelli/Getty Images

Lima gorgeously donned a baby pink dress that was adorned with colorful jewels as she posed at the Global Ocean hosted by H.S.H. Prince Albert II of Monaco at Opera of Monte-Carlo.

Jennifer Lawrence

Pascal Le Segretain/Getty Images

Lawrence gave us stylish fall vibes in all black cropped top, pleated maxi skirt, and a leather jacket. She wore a few cute charmed necklaces too.

Mandy Moore

Frazer Harrison/Getty Images

Moore was a red carpet standout at the 2019 Emmys wearing one of the biggest color combinations of the night: pink and red.
description: Check out five great outfits from this week from Sarah Jessica Parker, Zendaya, Adriana Lima and more.
